about_the_game:
PLAY YOUR WAY

Skyfear is an arena shooter game like no other. In the spirit and style of genre-defining shooters of the early 2000s videogame era, Skyfear hosts a variety of ways to play centered around the core arena gameplay. With flying mechanics inspired by the aerial agility of bats, Skyfear puts you in control of a prehistoric wyvern ready to fight other wyverns with fire and blood. Breath fire, shoot fire bolts, dodge and roll mid-air, launch special ability attacks, and make use of physical trait perks that suit a variety of playstyles. Play battles with standard rules, or customize your own. Play online, solo offline, or play over LAN.

A GAME FOR LONE WOLF OR PACKS

While offering multiplayer capabilities, Skyfear also offers full support for offline play as a single player. Play offline battles versus dynamic AI opponents and continue to earn in-game progress. AI difficulty and features can be adjusted.

FEATURES

  • Custom games, server browser

  • LAN support  

  • Run or fly, take the combat to the ground or the air

  • Responsive aerial maneuvering; combat is about position and timing

  • Online PvP or offline versus dynamic AI bots, both earn progress

  • Character customization

  • No microtransactions

content_descriptors.notes: Gameplay involves high intensity acts of fantasy and creature violence, using magical effects. No blood, gore, or human-like characters are used. Game world features some dark and gloomy atmospheres.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3
  • Processor: At least 4 Core, 3.0 GHz speed
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti (used in development) / Equivalent and up
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Install to a solid state drive (SSD) for best experience.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS 3
  • Processor: 8 or more cores, 4.0 or more GHz speed
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Equivalent and up
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Install to a solid state drive (SSD) for best experience.

name: Skyfear

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 and up
  • Processor: At least 4 Core, 3.0 GHz speed
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti (used in development) / Equivalent and up
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Install to a solid state drive (SSD) for best experience.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 8 or more cores, 4.0 or more GHz speed
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Equivalent and up
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Install to a solid state drive (SSD) for best experience.

short_description: Prehistoric arena shooter where players control fast-flying fire-breathing dragons! Up to 6 players in online battles or play vs bots offline, with a heavily customizable experience.
